title: 求大膽試藥既醫生/精神科醫生,搵倒有論文支持.不能上學4年,病8年,脂肪不耐腹瀉,手腳無力,25歲胖男

replies.msg:
求大膽試藥既醫生/精神科醫生,搵倒有論文支持.不能上學4年,病8年,脂肪不耐腹瀉,手腳無力,25歲胖男
https://mecfsroadmap.altervista.org/
入link按General Therapies for ME/CFS有好多療法,例如:
Reducing fatigue and increasing energy: methylphenidate, agomelatine, amantadine, amisulpride, moclobemide.
Treating post-exertional malaise: pyridostigmine

我既資料:

1.Symptoms

1.1 Main symptoms

Fat malabsorption from 2014: Only eat a small amount of fat daily because: If I eat the same amount of fat like normal people, I will fart frequently and will have loose stool.
Limbs weakness from 2012 (both hands and feet) (level: can barely cook for myself): occupational therapist diagnosed me that my hands get slow after repetitive movements. After tidying up the apartment for 45min, I have to sit for 5 hours to recover my strength. Fatigue won’t recover after ejaculation unless I take chinese medicine. Low stamina of fingers

1.2 Minor symptoms

1.2.1 Abdomen

My stomach blocked after eating whole grain.
After drinking cold water, my abdomen will feel uncomfortably cold.
Uncomfortable after drinking skim milk (can’t remember, maybe had diarrhea/ abdomen bloated).

1.2.2 Others

Hands and feet have sweat. Feet peel a lot
Impotence (hardness level: banana)

2. Medical history

2.1 Supplements

Bio-Gest by Thorne (1 capsule a meal)/ 200mg pancreatin 10X made my abdomen pain.
Probiotics (3bilion) made me have loose stools.
B vitamin complex improved my fatigue a bit, but no further improvements.
Digestin by JM (pancreatin 30mg,diastase 20mg, papin (papain?) 40mg, lysine HCl100mg, vitamin B-1 10mg) improved my fat malabsorption for 1 time out of about 7 times.

2.2 Western medicine

Haven’t have any stool tests
Haven’t drunk milk/ soy milk added with calcium daily
Fatty liver diagnosed by ultrasound. gallbladder scanned with no findings
Gastroenterologist: gastritis diagnosed in 2017 (shouldn’t have now).
Neurology: performed nerve conduction study and then excluded Myasthenia gravis
CT brain with no findings
Endocrinology: excluded Cushing's syndrome
psychiatry：citalopram (hbr) 20mg/ sertraline (HCl) 25mg/ aripiprazole 2.5mg made me constipation & didn’t help
X-ray on chest, back & neck

2.3 Homepathy

Sulphur Q1 (don’t work)

2.4 Chinese medicine

Chinese herbals (45%) & acupuncture (5%) alleviated half of my fatigue but no further improvements. Chinese herbals alleviated my diarrhoea.

3. Onset

Roughly from September 2009 to May 2011, I ate too much tortoise jelly [made from the gao/ paste of plastron (bottom shell) from the turtle & chinese herbs with cooling effects] & drank too much chinese herbal cooling tea 4 times a week for 1 month & 1 time a week for other time, to prevent acne. Masturbated 5 times for 1 week, 3 times a week for 2 weeks, 2 times a week for the other time.
From Sep 2012, started feeling weak
In May 2014, started getting severe fatigue
In June & july 2014, barely attended school. The result is getting more tired.
In Sep 2014, started to have diarrhea frequently

想問你平時飲食食咩 點解無力 同唔食得脂肪 都可以肥到100kg?

有冇驗過係唔係乳糖不耐症？試吓戒奶製品。

我家人以前同你類似情況，個人唔夠中氣，虛（虛都會出暗瘡），寒。

我個陣日日用暖壺焗北芪黨參紅棗水杞子佢飲，或者高麗參北芪杞子圓肉燉烏雞薑片，煮蕃薯糖水落勁多薑，節瓜咸蛋三文魚/瘦肉煲湯又係勁加薑，煲完食埋啲薑。

呢啲可以補中氣虛同驅寒。

食養陰丸都可以令個人無咁寒，好難食，我自己食咗一罐就好番好多，手腳無咁凍，你不如寫吓你平日食咩，會唔會食咗寒涼野唔知？

我覺得飲滴雞精同食綜合維他命丸都可以令個人無咁攰，我飲鴻福堂滴雞精，日日一包。

你睡眠質素好唔好？會唔會好大鼻鼾？睡眠窒息症都會咁樣，好似手軟腳軟咁。

飲唔夠水個人多毒素都會易生暗瘡，每日起碼要飲2 升水。

慢慢會好d 架，加油！

replies.msg:
首先你要明白
chronic fatigue syndrome 唔係一個“病”黎
佢唔似cancer咁真係搵到病因
而只不過係一個label
比d醫生將一d解釋唔到既症狀推落去

但問題你而家唔係冇一個合理原因呀
肥胖導致疲勞係一個好common嘅原因
所以根本要rule out左呢樣野先斷定到你係咪chronic fatigue

而且退一萬步講就算你真係 chronic fatigue syndrome
chronic fatigue syndrome 叫chronic fatigue 就係佢無原因/無quick fix
所以根本唔存在食藥可以增加體力既可能性
如果得既你就唔係chronic fatigue

而chronic fatigue暫時最好既治療都係做運動
只不過係好密切咁監測住咁做因為好易會有反覆
所以樓主都係做運動把啦

Supplements beneficial for ME/CFS. Acetyl-L-carnitine improves mental fatigue in ME/CFS.1 L-carnitine helps ME/CFS.1 Omega 3 with omega 6 fatty acids (fish oil plus evening primrose oil) improve ME/CFS symptoms.1 VegEPA (EPA-rich essential fatty acids) produces ME/CFS symptom remission and structural brain changes.1 2 Magnesium injections improve energy levels and emotional state, and results in less pain in ME/CFS (transdermal magnesium is an alternative to injections).1

Malic acid taken with magnesium can increase energy in ME/CFS and reduce pain in fibromyalgia.1 2 Pharmaton capsules (Panax ginseng plus B vitamins) improve fatigue in ME/CFS.1 Multivitamin and multimineral supplements may improve fatigue, sleep disorders, autonomic nervous system symptoms and headaches in ME/CFS.1

Vitamin D supplementation can result in a marked reduction in pain in fibromyalgia.1 Probiotics improve ME/CFS symptoms,1 and reduce anxiety symptoms.1 D-ribose can significantly improve ME/CFS and fibromyalgia symptoms.1 Melatonin before bed improves fatigue, concentration and motivation in ME/CFS.1 Folinic acid reduces fatigue and pain in ME/CFS.1

https://mecfsroadmap.altervista.org/
Supplements beneficial for ME/CFS. Acetyl-L-carnitine improves mental fatigue in ME/CFS.1 L-carnitine helps ME/CFS.1 Omega 3 with omega 6 fatty acids (fish oil plus evening primrose oil) improve ME/CFS symptoms.1 VegEPA (EPA-rich essential fatty acids) produces ME/CFS symptom remission and structural brain changes.1 2 Magnesium injections improve energy levels and emotional state, and results in less pain in ME/CFS (transdermal magnesium is an alternative to injections).1

DHEA improves pain, fatigue, anxiety, memory and sexual problems in ME/CFS patients.1 NADH helps ME/CFS.1 Co-enzyme Q10 may increase energy in ME/CFS,1 and 150 mg of Q10 daily has been shown in a clinical trial to improve cognitive function and autonomic dysfunction in ME/CFS.1 High cocoa polyphenol rich chocolate may improve ME/CFS symptoms.1 Undenatured whey protein may help ME/CFS by boosting intracellular glutathione.1

Malic acid taken with magnesium can increase energy in ME/CFS and reduce pain in fibromyalgia.1 2 Pharmaton capsules (Panax ginseng plus B vitamins) improve fatigue in ME/CFS.1 Multivitamin and multimineral supplements may improve fatigue, sleep disorders, autonomic nervous system symptoms and headaches in ME/CFS.1

Vitamin D supplementation can result in a marked reduction in pain in fibromyalgia.1 Probiotics improve ME/CFS symptoms,1 and reduce anxiety symptoms.1 D-ribose can significantly improve ME/CFS and fibromyalgia symptoms.1 Melatonin before bed improves fatigue, concentration and motivation in ME/CFS.1 Folinic acid reduces fatigue and pain in ME/CFS.1

尤其是你咁多年睇左咁多醫生都搵唔到病因
其實我之前係telegram同你傾過幾句不過之後就再冇傾過
不過我都唔太知點幫你好
我諗最好都係你去盡量搵到邊個醫生可以幫到你就去搵
我睇曬上面d人講既野
但我真係覺得你唔似係cfs
因為cfs唔會有你其他講過不相關既症狀
希望你都唔好放棄
我曾經都係因為焦慮症而攰到起唔到身
其他人唔明白你又未經歷過你既病真係可以幾口臭講乜都得
佢地又唔係有牌既醫生唔明點解可以幫你斷症
你都係唔好聽果d把口臭過屎坑既人講野啦唔係令自己情緒更差
希望你有日會搵到真係病因
祝早日康復
